english.segment1: Cant stop talking bout everything Hes done. Its the best thing, happened since the world began. It didnt come cheap but I got it for free. Its the hope of glory, Christ in me
english.segment2: He helped me to see when my spirit was blind. Its amazing if you look just what youll find. Every step I took, He took two. If He did it for me, He can do it for you
english.segment3: Do you know Him? (Yes, I do). Do you know what I say is true?. Do you know Him? (Yes, I do). If He did it for me, He can do it for you. (Verse)
